Paul Fisher's feedback

  • Easy way to access my services or my stuff
  • What to do if i don't want everybody to see my services
  • The country flag should mention that it's the location of the service as some users might think that it's the location of the submitter
  • The search within result would be nice if it's applicable to search result too not only filtering result
  • It is not clear from the operation page where are the input and output of the services. It all over the place. Need a way to allow the user to see just the basic something like here
  • Possibility to collapse example input/output if there are too many
  • Description box can be replaced by add description
  • Possibility to test services
  • Replace the term 'overview' by another word maybe 'Detail service view'
  • Monitor picture is the most important but lost in the middle of load of texts.
  • Comment system is not too flexible.
  • Make soaplab submission easy
  • During submission if a service is already submitted should be able to see his overview without clicking on that service
